    G

    GameEvent - Interface in com.dnikitin.poker.common.model.events
    Represents the finite set of events that can occur within the Poker game logic.
    GameEvent.CardsDealt - Record Class in com.dnikitin.poker.common.model.events
    Triggered when cards are distributed to a player.
    GameEvent.GameFinished - Record Class in com.dnikitin.poker.common.model.events
    Triggered at the end of a hand when a winner is determined.
    GameEvent.GameStarted - Record Class in com.dnikitin.poker.common.model.events
    Triggered when the game transitions from the Lobby phase to active gameplay.
    GameEvent.PlayerAction - Record Class in com.dnikitin.poker.common.model.events
    Triggered when a player performs a visible action (e.g., Bet, Fold).
    GameEvent.PlayerJoined - Record Class in com.dnikitin.poker.common.model.events
    Triggered when a new player successfully sits at the table.
    GameEvent.RoundInfo - Record Class in com.dnikitin.poker.common.model.events
    Triggered to update public table information (Pot size, etc.).
    GameEvent.StateChanged - Record Class in com.dnikitin.poker.common.model.events
    Triggered when the game phase changes (e.g., from BETTING to DRAW).
    GameEvent.TurnChanged - Record Class in com.dnikitin.poker.common.model.events
    Triggered when the active turn passes to another player.
    GameFinished(String, int, String, List) - Constructor for record class com.dnikitin.poker.common.model.events.GameEvent.GameFinished
    Creates an instance of a GameFinished record class.
    gameId() - Method in record class com.dnikitin.poker.common.model.events.GameEvent.GameStarted
    Returns the value of the gameId record component.
    GameObserver - Interface in com.dnikitin.poker.common.model.events
    Defines the contract for components that wish to listen to game state changes.
    GameStarted(String) - Constructor for record class com.dnikitin.poker.common.model.events.GameEvent.GameStarted
    Creates an instance of a GameStarted record class.
